document_title: FortiManager & FortiAnalyzer - Inter ADOM information leakage

note.text: An improper access control vulnerability [CWE-284] in FortiManager and FortiAnalyzer management interface may allow a remote and authenticated admin user assigned to a specific ADOM to access other ADOMs information such as device information and dashboard information.
note.title: Summary

note.text: FortiManager version 7.2.0 FortiManager version 7.0.0 through 7.0.3 FortiManager version 6.4.0 through 6.4.7 FortiManager version 6.2.0 through 6.2.9 FortiManager version 6.0.0 through 6.0.11 FortiAnalyzer version 7.2.0 FortiAnalyzer version 7.0.0 through 7.0.3 FortiAnalyzer version 6.4.0 through 6.4.8 FortiAnalyzer version 6.2.0 through 6.2.10 FortiAnalyzer version 6.0.0 through 6.0.12
note.title: Affected Products

note.text: Please upgrade to FortiManager version 7.2.1 or above Please upgrade to FortiManager version 7.0.4 or above Please upgrade to FortiManager version 6.4.8 or above Please upgrade to FortiAnalyzer version 7.2.1 or above Please upgrade to FortiAnalyzer version 7.0.4 or above Please upgrade to FortiAnalyzer version 6.4.9 or above
note.title: Solutions

acknowledgment.description: Fortinet is pleased thank Abdulmohsen Nasser Alotaibi, from DEEM @ SDAIA for reporting this vulnerability under responsible disclosure.

vulnerability.title: FortiManager & FortiAnalyzer - Inter ADOM information leakage
